message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I'm looking for $20000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $18000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm not willing to go below $18000, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $17500? It's a bit above your offer, but I think it's a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
